message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a premium price of $12,000. I believe it holds significant value and this reflects its worth.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $8,000 for the item.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product offers unique value you won't easily find elsewhere. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet you at $10,000. I would like to propose $9,000 as my final offer.
